casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Mitchell Baron (12121)

O’Connell, Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued June 6 decision released June 28, 1994 Stephen G. Murphy, Jr., with whom, on the brief, was Benjamin A. Solnit, for the appellant (defendant). Marjorie Allen Dauster, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and James Clark, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
